1370: Oudrauen moved to Kerckstraet.C.5 after marriage.
Got married to Liedelde at age 21 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Liedelde, Yseboldus, at age 22.
1373: Had a daughter with Liedelde, Kerstine, at age 24.
1374: Had a son with Liedelde, Costan, at age 25.
1376: Had a daughter with Liedelde, Atghardis, at age 27.
1379: Had a son with Liedelde, Sibrando, at age 30.
1383: Had a son with Liedelde, Engelbertus, at age 34.
1384: Had a daughter with Liedelde, Aleberna, at age 35.
1389: Had a daughter with Liedelde, Flore, at age 40.
1390: Had a daughter with Liedelde, Natelien, at age 41.
1392: Lost daughter Aleydis when Aleydis was 0 years old.
Liedelde gave birth to their stillborn daughter Aleydis in 1392.
